title: ðŸš¨New York Jets hire Robert Saleh - Emergency Podcast (Football 1/14)
description:
You've seen Robert Saleh animated on the sidelines of 49ers games and now he'll take that passion to New York as the next head coach of the Jets. The 41-year-old defensive mastermind takes over for Adam Gase and reportedly brings with him Mike LaFleur, younger brother of John Breech clone and Packers coach Matt LaFleur, to run the offense. How will the Jets look on both sides of the ball? What's in store for Sam Darnold and the No. 2 pick? Will Brinson and Ryan Wilson break down their second coaching emergency pod of the day (because: Pick Six!).Â 

ï»¿'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
